website_summaries.verdict: The Cresimo has been described as the Sherman tank of bar sets. We find the pieces to be heavy and well-balanced. Attractive price point, and makes a great wedding or housewarming gift.
pros: Recipe flip book included in kit
Individual parts are heavy and durable
Stand designed to sit flush against the wall
cons: Shaker parts do not fit well, some leakage
Quality of metal not as impressive as other sets
Some consumers note missing pieces on arrival

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your home bar
customer_reviews.text: Great product, functional and easy to use and clean. Only draw back is that base holder does not hold all of the pieces that come with it. Overall this is an awesome addition to your home bar, contains everything you need as a novice or advanced cocktail maker.
customer_reviews.author: zenmedic

customer_reviews.title: Excellent find for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got sick of paying $15 for cocktails in New York bars and wanted to get a simple cocktail mixer to pregame at home. This was an excellent find. It can make almost three drinks in one go. Go for it. You won't regret it. And it also looks way cooler when you shake it up. The cap is tight enough to not let any liquid out and noobs like me could handle it pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set and stand!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my husband who has been daydreaming about making Manhattans and Old Fashioneds for a few months. The stand is nice and keeps the utensils from getting mixed into the dreaded utensil drawer - saves us from having to dig through spatulas and measuring cups to find the corkscrew. Plus stainless steal is easy to clean! It's the perfect starter set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just the basics
customer_reviews.text: Its a basic set but good for the price. My only issue is the lid getting stuck on the shaker. This can happen especially with sweeter drinks. You can prevent this by taking all the pieces out and washing it directly after making your drink. Or running hot water over it helps break up any syrupy glue effect if you let it sit out too long.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Cresimo Brushed Stainless Professional Bar Set
customer_reviews.text: The set is very nice, very well made. All the tools you would need for your bar. I was very pleased with the quality and durability of this set, because I was giving it as a gift. I would highly recommend it to anyone who is thinking of purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: agapetor

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set! Looks great sitting in counter too. Had small issue with one piece but their customer service was awesome and quickly took care of it. Makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Shiningstar

customer_reviews.title: Nice overall, but the shaker is pour quality (poor, get it?)
customer_reviews.text: The smaller cap on the shaker lid got SO stuck after 2 uses, even though we cleaned after each use, that it’s become impossible to remove. We’ve tried everything. Since then, the lid has developed a small crack, so it leaks when you shake a drink in it. Attached is an image of light coming through the crack between the cap and the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Aepozsik

customer_reviews.title: Great products except for the stand.
customer_reviews.text: All of the items are great! I would’ve given it 5 stars if it wasn’t for the actual stand. The cork screw doesn’t quite fit in there properly so it’s a bit flimsy. The strainer and bottle opener fits in the top hole but seems a bit hard to get into place into the bottom hole when working quickly. But the value of these items are great!! I wish the muddler had a place in the stand though. It would look classy mixed in!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Waldron

customer_reviews.title: The shaker seems shorter than most but seems to be adequate.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a set that included most things needed for making various cocktails because someone gifted me with a monthly box of Shaker and Spoon. You get several recipes and the items to make various cocktails each month. I just needed the tools. I didn’t want to spend a lot since I had received the rest as a gift. I also didn’t want to buy so cheap that I could only use once. The price was right and when I received it, which delivery was on time, the quality was just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Meitz

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for beginner bartenders!
customer_reviews.text: This is the very first kit I got for homebartending! All of these are essential tools for bartenders and useful! These are great for beginners like me. It would be nice if they came with a fine mesh strainer as well though!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Y.

customer_reviews.title: Shaker is small and tops gets stuck
customer_reviews.text: The make of the shaker is great and it looks nice on the counter...its also very easy to clean. Unfortunately, the shaker itself only fits enough alcohol for about 1 drink. 2 drinks pushes its capacity and leaves you with a bit of a mess. For single drinks, no problem. Also, once you add ice, it is near impossible to get the lid off with the suction.
customer_reviews.author: Leah T.

customer_reviews.title: Only Received 11 of the 12 Items
customer_reviews.text: When we opened our Amazon box, the bar set product box inside was already open. When we investigated, we did not receive the bottle opened for the set. It looked as though someone had opened the box and purposefully removed the bottle opener. So we only received 11 pieces of this 12-piece set. It's disappointing, but not enough so that we want to go through the hassle of returning it altogether. We probably wont use the stand from the set either as there's not a spot for all of the accessories in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Good starter set
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a starter bar kit to play around with and mix drinks. It is a good set the shaker is why I mainly bought this set. It works nice and does not leak. I haven’t had a problem with anything rusting. I also like the way the jigger is made makes it easy to pour liquor. The corkscrew and bottle opener work fine. I have yet to find a use for the tongs but when I have a party I will find a way to used them.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition
customer_reviews.text: This cocktail bar set is a great addition to my home bar! Looks wonderful at my bar! Thank you for making such a great product; which, is a great addition to my home bar! Great job!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maranda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Be careful using
customer_reviews.text: First time using the lid got stuck on shaker and I managed to cut my hand on the ridge of the shaker trying to take it off so be careful! I've kept the kit anyway and have used it several times with much success.
customer_reviews.author: The Gibleedoos

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a huge drinker (especially of the mixed variety) so getting this set was as much about decorating my bar as it was their practical use. It meets the requirement of looking good and I'm certain it will do fine when called upon to mix or open things.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Space saver and great tools
customer_reviews.text: Used this product a hand full of times and am already not disappointed. I feel so sophisticated creating drinks at home.
customer_reviews.author: Vienna Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good kit with a bad shaker
customer_reviews.text: Set works great but the shaker cracked after only a month of using it. The rest of the tools are great and it would have been rated much higher if it wasnt for the shaker...
customer_reviews.author: Camo Bully

customer_reviews.title: My hubby love this product .
customer_reviews.text: Thi is the perfect gift for my hubby, he love it 😍 I truly recommended, if you loved to prepared a good Beverages.
customer_reviews.author: Rigoberto & Eunices FIGUEROA

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice in our bar! A must have for entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Attractive stainless steel. It comes in a small box so you can keep all of it together for easy storing. I do recommend this for your first bar accessory. I plan on taking mine with me on vacations.
customer_reviews.author: midwest

customer_reviews.title: Some pieces do not fit in stand.
customer_reviews.text: The strainer does not fit into either of the 2 holes in the holder. There are also not enough slots for all the pieces. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: breviewer

customer_reviews.title: Okay for a starter set
customer_reviews.text: Set was okay at best. Feels very cheap. The tools are the best thing about this but the jigger and shaker both feel extremely cheap plus the sides feel very sharp.. I feel like if I'm not careful I could cut myself on them.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Crnojevich

customer_reviews.title: A good starter set
customer_reviews.text: Got this set as a starter for myself. All the pieces seem to be pretty good quality. The only piece I will replace is the strainer since it basically is as good as the strainer on the shaker. This is a good starter set for someone just getting into making drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Matz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Only 4 stars because some of the pieces don't fit well inside the stand. Otherwise it is great. Good quality. We purchased for my husbands liquor cabinet and it fits well!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie bates

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Not all Pieces Fit in Holder
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Easy to use, easy to clean. Only draw back is that not all the pieces fit in the holder. The shaker is also a little bit to small, you can make 2 drinks tops. But that's all I needed it for anyway. Would recommend for the price and the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Afton

customer_reviews.title: Everything a mixologist needs.
customer_reviews.text: This will be part of a bar themed gift basket. The tools are lovely, well made and just feel high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl g culevski

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this set, it's exactly what he wanted plus more!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband for Xmas but gave it to him early he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean looks great on my barcart. Would say good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: skatergirl023

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and stylish little bar set.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bar set. Great for making simple drinks. Most sets at this price do not include a muddler, but this one does, which is why I chose it. Shaker is a good full size and closes snugly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT FOR MY NEW FLAT
customer_reviews.text: LIKED A LOT ALREADY USE IT AT A PARTY NICE QUALITY
customer_reviews.author: Laura Melendez

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a really nice set. The stand/holder is a bit flimsy but for the price it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Received used, dirty, sticky product
customer_reviews.text: The item seemed decent but unfortunately I received a nasty, sticky one. It looks like someone returned theirs after using it and they sent it to me.
customer_reviews.author: M.A

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: It was a great set with a nice stand. Good value for money. Would buy as a gift again!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a goft fof my daughter’s boyfriend. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Hope Wiles

customer_reviews.title: Getting a great product for good value
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect addition to our small bar! It’s great quality and value. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: nikole marek

customer_reviews.title: Chug chug chug
customer_reviews.text: Complete bar set! Loved it, just wish it had an ice bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Plus I'm having fun mixing!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used any bar ware to fix our drinks. With this set the utensils are versatile and haven't needed any other utensil. Plus I'm having fun mixing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: It’s a present so haven’t used the set yet, but it looks nice and like we got our money’s worth. Will update esp. if any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Island Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Just about perfect
customer_reviews.text: There isn't a felt bottom, or a stand for this one, just the steel bottom. Also there isn't a slot for every piece. Other than that it is great!.. the price is great, the look is great, and I love my Shaker!!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my husband and he loved it! Easy to clean and storage, stainless steel and has all the necessary tools.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great set - good quality - doesn’t take up much room. Come home from work now and enjoy a nice cocktail each night. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: J Frey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love the brushed stainless steel, and your shipping was very quick -- thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition!
customer_reviews.text: Nice added addition to my husbands bar. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: It makes GREAT long Island iced tea
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my boyfriend since his last one broke and he loves it. He's been wanting a cocktail bartender set and this was more than perfect! He got what he wanted and more. It is such nice quality and it looks wonderful when everything is set up in the stand. And it was such a good price. A win all around!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: I am not able to provide an actual review of ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not able to provide an actual review of how the product performs or how it compares to others because important parts were incorrect or missing altogether. I received 2 bottoms to the shaker and no top. I also did not receive the jigger, or tongs which I could use the product without, but without a top, it is unusable which would be zero stars if that were an option.
customer_reviews.author: #1broncofan

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT get what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 12 piece set but got 7 piece set instead. Very disappointed. Feel cheated.
customer_reviews.author: Doxwife

customer_reviews.title: ... this as a gift to accompany the Esquire Drink Like a Man book for my brother's birthday
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift to accompany the Esquire Drink Like a Man book for my brother's birthday. I really liked that it came with a holder to keep all of the pieces in place and on display. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: KacieD

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great set for just starting a home bar. Has all of the basics at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to donate as part of a raffle item for an Alzheimer's event. It's better than I thought! So glad I scooped this up because it will be a great addition to my basket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: I've enjoyed using this set. It does a fine job of mixing the drinks, and cleans up nicely in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Helselw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set up for your home bar needs. Love this kit and have sent out a couple others as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Item
customer_reviews.text: Makes a nice addition to our liquor cabinet. We did have an issue with the corkscrew not fitting but we received a new set that was perfect. Very pleasant to deal with through this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Keirnan

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable
customer_reviews.text: Cute set for the Price- the actual mixer seemed bigger in the picture but besides that the actual set is nice and I love the stand it comes with also not to mention the little book of cocktails it brings !
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: Rusting after three uses. Wine key is crap. Wish I could’ve returned but the 30 days was up. Cute set otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit but can't get rid of that metallic smell.
customer_reviews.text: I like it but noticed my jigger had a bit of rust on it and I can't seem to get that metallic smell out of the cup after a couple of washes.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for one of my friends for are Secret Santa this year, it is nice and easy to use; Has a nice stand for every thing and is easy to clean. Had to try it out my self.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but breaks quickly
customer_reviews.text: The tools you get in the kit are very nice, and the shaker worked pretty much perfectly.. However, the stem of the shaker split after only a month or so of use. Pretty bummed that I have to replace it so quickly :/
customer_reviews.author: ut44wh1

customer_reviews.title: Missing Part
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a birthday gift for my husband. He opened it tonight and it had two cocktail strainers instead of a cocktail strainer and bottle opener as advertised. Pretty bummed since this was a gift and was incorrect. It was delivered on time and quality of what we did receive was what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: K. Munn

customer_reviews.title: Stand doesn’t hold everything
customer_reviews.text: Stand doesn’t hold all items in set. Metal is thin and isn’t the highest quality.
customer_reviews.author: TLe

customer_reviews.title: All in all it looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: It ok, the cocktail shaker is smaller then I was anticipating. All in all it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: riversidedogwalking

customer_reviews.title: Set overall is fine, but shaker freezes quickly
customer_reviews.text: Even with light ice and only shaking for a few seconds, with shaker secured tightly, liquid seems to get in between the seal and freeze the shaker. Not incredibly useful, but all the other pieces are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Cocktail Lover!
customer_reviews.text: Used my shaker set for the 1st time this weekend while camping. I love it! Especially how cold my martini go while shaking in the stainless shaker. I used everything except for the cork screw.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Boggess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect home bar set
customer_reviews.text: Good quality set that makes your home bar the perfect place to be.
customer_reviews.author: mandy wood

customer_reviews.title: Has everything you need
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome. I order this as a gift and my brother loved how much was included. It’s made of great material and has everything you need and it’s well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Tosh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product better that advertised, good job and keep it up
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Voelp

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my bar. The stand is the best part.
customer_reviews.author: Er H.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great start for my home bar and cocktails! I appreciate that they have some easy recipes to start with. Great kit!
customer_reviews.author: clucci

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I wish that there would have been space on the platform for the muddler as well, and maybe the poor spouts, but other than that it is great!
customer_reviews.author: candice bradley

customer_reviews.title: I love it, but I haven't given it yet
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be a Christmas gift. I love it, but I haven't given it yet. If it was for me it would love it and couldn't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: I should have looked at the size of the shaker ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have looked at the size of the shaker. I needed a family/party size. This one will only hold one glass at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Sloane Maurice

customer_reviews.title: Great cockstail bar set
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift so I have not used this but everything came exactly as described and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney L. Sevy

customer_reviews.title: great responses.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a special friends gift.....great responses...they then bought for their friends...fun gift! Love the recipe book that comes with it:)
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Brandsma

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Actually, it seemed a little cheap and tinny. I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: gdennis

customer_reviews.title: great gift for the bartender in your family
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my niece as Christmas gift. Came really fast and was good quality. Good communication and appreciate the follow up.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: They really liked it
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my son and his girlfriend. They really liked it
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good in quality, it's very easy to use for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Long

customer_reviews.title: Bartender set
customer_reviews.text: Like the stainless steel look and was just what we were looking for. Could not find anything like this in the local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mixer
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, I have been testing margaritas with it and it has created some incredible mixes. It makes about two whole drinks per shaker. Well worth the buy and definitely recommend it to whomever is looking to advance their mixology
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice brushed metal finish
customer_reviews.text: Nice brushed metal finish. This isn't a super expensive bar set, so it's not going to be top quality. Considering the price, it's a good value, though.
customer_reviews.author: David Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought it would be but decent set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey S.

customer_reviews.title: Cresimo cocktail bar set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for his birthday, and he loved it!

customer_reviews.title: Top shelf item
customer_reviews.text: Item is better than expected. Cresimo delivers exactly what they say.
customer_reviews.author: Jamey

customer_reviews.title: I’m very satisfied with the quality and excellent merchandise I received
customer_reviews.text: I’m very satisfied with the quality and excellent merchandise I received, it was fast and secure. Also the delivery thru Amazon prime, excellent
customer_reviews.author: Jose Santos

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Product!
customer_reviews.text: Look great on our new bar. It was exactly what we wanted.

customer_reviews.title: He liked it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a Christmas gift. He liked it a lot.

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied! Will tell my friends to buy
customer_reviews.text: Beyond expectations! 100% satisfied! Will tell my friends to buy!

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for myself and was amazingly surprised when it arrived. It is everything I was looking for and more. You have gained another customer for life!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We used the shaker and it chilled/mixed our drinks perfectly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything came as the order claimed. Nothing wrong with it and I’m ready to start making drinks

customer_reviews.text: Comes as pictured, even comes with a little recipe booklet

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected,

customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! My boyfriend is sure to love this for his birthday.

customer_reviews.text: ...tough, attractive, easy to clean, functional. My fiancee, the ex-bar tender loves it.

customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. Very nice set. Great shopping/shipping experience. I would definitely recommend this to family & friends.

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this set
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this set. It classes up the joint and it's made from good materials. You can't beat it for the price.

product_meta.title: Cresimo Home Cocktail Bar Set - Brushed Stainless Steel 12 Piece Professional Bar Tool Kit - 100% GUARANTEE AND WARRANTY. Includes Martini Shaker, Muddler, Strainer, Jigger and More!
feature_bullets: GREAT VALUE » Complete Cocktail Shaker Bar Set / Bartender Kit made of superior 18/8 grade stainless steel. Professional cocktail shaker / muddler / bar spoon / hawthorne strainer / a premium double size 1.0 / 0.5 oz measurement jigger tool / corkscrew / bottle opener / ice tongs / plus an Illustrated Guide to Cocktails recipe book.

QUALITY MATERIALS: RUSTPROOF & DISHWASHER SAFE » Our superior designed products are made with quality stainless steel and designed to last. CRESIMO Martini Shakers feature a high-grade inner, which does not leech harmful chemicals nor affect your beverages’ flavors. All of our products are dishwasher safe.

AMAZINGLY VERSATILE » The perfect bartender kit / drink mixer kit for making ice cold cocktail and mocktail recipes such as: Margarita’s, Cosmopolitan’s, Manhattan's, Old-Fashioned's, Long Island Iced Tea’s or Apple Martini’s.

CONVENIENT » Comes with a stainless steel storage rack to keep all your items in one place. Easy to store in a cabinet while not in use. Simple and easy to use! This cocktail / martini shaker set is recommended for beginner’s and experienced bartender's alike. Works great with all types of Liquor, such as Tequila, Rum, Vodka, and many more. It’s certain to be the most used piece of your barware arsenal!
WORRY FREE WARRANTY AND MONEY BACK GUARANTEE » 100% Guarantee, NO QUESTIONS ASKED! We are 100% confident in our products quality and you should be too!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars671 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
